headline: On Semicondutor earnings, Coeur Mining & Eaton announce deals
summary: There are a number of stocks on the move on Monday, Nov. 3. On Semiconductor (ON) posted a Q3 earnings beat. Coeur Mining (CDE) is acquiring New Gold (NGD). Eaton (ETN) also announced a deal. It's buying Boyd Thermal for $9.5 billion. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Eaton to Post Q3 Earnings: What to Expect for the Stock This Season?
summary: ETN is set to report third-quarter results with higher revenues and earnings, fueled by electrification trends and strong order growth.

headline: Eaton Signs Agreement to Acquire Boyd Thermal, Expanding Solutions for Data Center Customers to Include Critical Liquid Cooling Technology
summary: DUBLIN, November 03, 2025--Intelligent power management company Eaton (NYSE:ETN) today announced it has signed an agreement to acquire the Boyd Thermal business of Boyd Corporation from Goldman Sachs Asset Management. Boyd Thermal is a leader in thermal components, systems and ruggedized solutions for data centers, aerospace and other end markets. Under the terms of the agreement, Eaton will pay $9.5 billion, which represents 22.5 times Boyd Thermal’s estimated adjusted EBITDA for 2026*. Boyd Th
